messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] SC weather
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/17/2002 8:58:21 PM Eastern Daylight Time, ... I ll post it Wed or Thurs before the conference. Unfortunately, as beautiful as it can be in
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/17/2002 8:58:21 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
> Whats the weather like in SC in October? Do we bring winter
> woolies or must we be prepared for the summer heat?
>
>
I'll post it Wed or Thurs before the conference. Unfortunately, as beautiful
as it can be in Columbia in October, it can be JUST as unpredictable! I'll
keep you all updated as we find out!

K

And I was really hoping to see you in the birthday suit. Bummer! Come comfy!



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
